_comment.env: A 'dev' value push any errors to discord. A 'prod' value will push generic error message to discord
_comment.requestRetryLimit: member api requests will retry this many times before giving up.
_comment.cougarcsServerIds: servers that will run the bot
_comment.cougarcsInviteLinks: invite links mapped to each server. Links must have no limit and never expire.
_comment.allowChannels: channels that the bot will be active in for non-officer users
_comment.omitChannels: bot will be inactive in these discord channels.
_comment.officerChannels: officer commands may give out personal information. these channels should not be public.
